name: places/ChIJ0UwJ4cVZwokRBRiK2kZlNmU
formattedAddress: 160 7th Ave S, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 160 7th Ave S, New York, NY 10014-2727, USA

originalText.text: I’ve been looking for different treatments to help deal with some mental stuff that I want to work through. After doing on-and-off talk therapy I’ve been open to trying something new to dig a bit deeper. I learned about Hudson Mind and they were very helpful walking me through the various treatments that they offer, what I should expect to get out of them, and various experiences people have had. I tried the IV therapy as it was recommended based on what I’ve been experiencing. I will say I was a little nervous but they helped put my mind at ease and we even did a quick meditation in the beginning of the treatment to ease my mind which really let me sink into the experience and calm my nerves. Everything throughout the process was professional, clean and just an overall great and it was a transformative experience. The staff is really friendly and welcoming and you can tell they really believe in their treatments. This treatment really shifted my perspective on a lot of things and I was able to uncover some past deep traumas with a different outlook. I’ll definitely be going back to continue treatment and highly recommend them. There’s still a lot of work to do and I’m looking forward to Hudson Mind helping facilitate that journey.

originalText.text: Beyond having a great treatment experience with Dr. Kuo, I am exited to see great results after my Dual Sympathetic Block and Ketamine IV treatment. I feel less anxiety, hyper vigilance in my day to day and my intrusive thoughts are gone. A big part of my life I have been struggling with PTSD and anxiety and this outcome makes me very happy and motivated!

text.text: Beyond having a great treatment experience with Dr. Kuo, I am exited to see great results after my Dual Sympathetic Block and Ketamine IV treatment. I feel less anxiety, hyper vigilance in my day to day and my intrusive thoughts are gone. A big part of my life I have been struggling with PTSD and anxiety and this outcome makes me very happy and motivated!

originalText.text: Dr. Muir @ Hudson Mind changed my life. While numerous other psychiatrists wouldn't even consider working with me due to the severity of my depression, Dr. Muir took me on as a patient. Dr. Muir correctly diagnosed me with OCD as opposed to just plain depression. Using a combination of dTMS protocols, Dr. Muir brought my decades worth of symptoms into complete remission. And using intelligence, humor, and compassion, Dr. Muir kept me engaged in the treatment and wanting to work with him. Dr. Muir made himself available whenever necessary and never made me feel like a burden. Dr Muir changed my life. I am healthier than I have been in years. Dr Muir walked with me through deep crises and celebrated my wellness. It is not an exaggeration to say that through his expert use of TMS and skillful psychotherapy  that he more than likely saved my life.

originalText.text:
I've tried a number of services at Hudson Mind as a supplement to therapy and my experience was stellar. The staff at Hudson are warm and welcoming and they really helped a first timer like me feel comfortable. The facilities are top notch and they really help you relax.

I would definitely recommend Hudson Mind as a provider to anyone looking for a professional in this field.

originalText.text: Dr. Kuo changed my life. I was experiencing severe anxiety and depression after losing a close friend, so we did various treatments to help, and I have never felt better. Highly recommend.
